name: Bayou Buford Pinball
description:
Please play in full-screen mode for best results.

Instructions: 

Press space to pull back the plunger and release to shoot the ball.

Press R to reset.

Click and hold the mouse button within the Ghost Zone to use your ghost powers to move the ball.

A demo game about playing an old pinball machine for a cartoon nobody remembers. The flippers are broken so you use your ghostly powers to gravitate the ball towards you.
